synopsis.text: Shiranai Watashi no Monogatari's spin-off, 'Hirune Hime: Ancien and the Magic Tablet,' takes viewers on a captivating journey with Ancien, a recurring character in Kokone's dreams. This enigmatic girl is the protagonist of a mysterious fairy tale that Kokone's father shared with her during her childhood. The short film delves deeper into the narrative, unveiling more of Ancien's enthralling adventure and expanding on the story presented in the original movie. Prepare to be enchanted by this magical tale that intertwines reality and dreams.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
